ygData.subject: Re: Starting Heritrix from another app...
ygData.msgSnippet: I solved this issue, i didn t referenced all of the libraries in the lib/ directory. I added all of jars in lib/ directory and problem solved.

I solved this issue, i didn't referenced all of the libraries in the lib/ d=
irectory. I added all of jars in lib/ directory and problem solved.
